this_title: The Natural World: Spectacled Bears: Shadows of the Forest
trans_title: 自然世界：眼镜熊——森林的阴影
introduction: The Spectacled Bear lives in Peru. Little is known about the habits of this elusive creature, and as narrator Stephen Fry reveals, many of our assumptions were wrong. For years they were thought to be gentle vegetarians, but the latest studies reveal a new and alarming side to this endangered bear.
chinese_title: 自然世界：眼镜熊——森林的阴影
foreign_title: The Natural World: Spectacled Bears: Shadows of the Forest
